biography: Carles Gusi is a spanish director of photography and he was born in 1953 in Barcelona, Catalonia. He is known for his work on  Yo, 'El Vaquilla' (1985),  Bufons i reis (1994), Torrente, the Dumb Arm of the Law (1998), Heart of the Warrior (1999), Celll 211 (2009), El Niño (2014) and Yucatán (2018).
name: Carles Gusi
